text: @realDonaldTrump Mr President, leave anything else - your pride, personal fights with anything and anyone - focus on stopping the terrible deaths of thousands of your citizens that we see every day. Or is it only us who see the the top priority of the USA 🇺🇸 at this time is stop COVID-19 deaths?

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
